## Mathematical Derivation of Birthday Problem

\[
\begin{aligned}
P(\text{at least one shared}) 
&= 1 - P(\text{all birthdays distinct}) \\[6pt]
P(\text{all birthdays distinct}) 
&= \frac{365}{365} \cdot \frac{364}{365} \cdot \frac{363}{365} \cdots \frac{365 - (n-1)}{365} \\[6pt]
&= \frac{365 \times (365 - 1) \times (365 - 2) \times \cdots \times (365 - n + 1)}{365^n} \\[6pt]
&= \frac{\dfrac{365!}{(365-n)!}}{365^n} \\[6pt]
\quad
P(\text{at least one shared}) 
&= 1 - \frac{365!}{(365-n)! \, 365^n}.
\end{aligned}
\]
